name: Bustle (Dimexel)
description:
Your puppies have gone missing! find them in this 2D platform game where you have to tackle obstacles and avoid hazards while searching for your lost puppies throughout the world.

Features
  • 32 unique levels to complete.
  • 4 different maps to explore.
  • 10 playable characters to unlock.
  • Pixel art game style.
  • 10+ Dangerous and useful objects to discover.

Note:  The desktop version of the game is just a demo , the full game will be available in Google Play.

Desktop Controls:

  • Move left and right: A, D.
  • Jump: LMB at the right side of the game screen.
